text: Joy Page (November 9, 1924 â€“ April 18, 2008) was an American actress. She played Annina Brandel in the movie Casablanca. She also played Marsinah in the 1944 movie Kismet. Page was born in Los Angeles, California. She died from pneumonia and a stroke, at age eighty-three.
